title: Champion Icons
body:
You know what would be cool?Skin icons.

I don't know what to call it so  i will just describe it. You know whenever you get a kill of just HUD at the bottom of the screen, the icon is replaced with the skin you are using, instead of the standard champion splash art. It would be pretty small but cool difference to the game i believe.

replies.body: YES!!! i have always thought this! it would be really cool
